item.title: Revealed: European 'green' investments hold billions in fossil fuel majors
item.author: theguardian.com
item.description:
Version 2
European "green" funds holding more than $33bn of investments in major oil and gas companies have been revealed by an investigation, despite fossil fuels being the root cause of the climate crisis. Some of these investment funds used branding such as Sustainable Global Stars and Europe Cl...
